TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Part of a system of ducts in the pancreas. Pancreatic juices containing enzymes are released into these ducts and flow into the small intestine.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Parte del sistema de conductos del p치ncreas. En estos conductos se liberan los jugos pancre치ticos que contienen enzimas y fluyen hacia el intestino delgado.
